extension.description:
Installed version 1.3. Download the latest version of the plugin --> SocComments Plugin
The plugin lets you add comments to articles on the following social networks and extensions:

*Facebook
*VK.com
*Disqus
*JComments
To use the form JComments comments must be installed component Jcomments
For subdomain (shortname) in Disqus the register your site here

Donate (PayPal):
Go to PayPal

Comment moderation:
For moderation comment, you must enter a user name and password in the social networking site Facebook and Vkontakte, and then in the forms of comments from the social networks will have additional links to manage comments. If you entered an account that is not the moderator, a link will be hidden.
For moderation of comments from JComments, you need to log in and go to adminpanel component JComments

How to get APP ID?
For APP ID for the forms you need to log in social network and click on the link:
for Facebook https://developers.facebook.com/apps creating an application using the instructions Facebook
for Vkontakte http://vkontakte.ru/developers.php?oid=-1&p=Comments indicating the address of the site and creating the application. Example: APP ID will VK.init ({apiId: 2221835, onlyWidgets: true});
